Step 2: Confirm that this line item corresponds to the systematic allocation.
- "Depreciation" in a cash flow statement typically reflects the systematic allocation of the assetâ€™s depreciable amount over its useful life, recognized as an expense.

Therefore, the value of the systematic allocation (depreciation expense) in this cash flow statement is 120970.16.
